mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(A.NT_BBS_SEQ) AS CNT FROM TBL_NT_BOARD A, TBL_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID

SELECT NT_BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_LEVEL, NT_BBS_TITLE, NT_BBS_CONTENT, NT_REG_DATE, NT_FILE_SEQ, NT_FILE_ORG_NAME, NT_FILE_NAME, NT_FILE_EXT, NT_FILE_SIZE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, NT_BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_LEVEL, NT_BBS_TITLE, NT_BBS_CONTENT, NT_REG_DATE, NT_FILE_SEQ, NT_FILE_ORG_NAME, NT_FILE_NAME, NT_FILE_EXT, NT_FILE_SIZE FROM (SELECT A.NT_BBS_SEQ, A.USER_ID, B.USER_LEVEL, NVL(A.NT_BBS_TITLE, '') AS NT_BBS_TITLE, NVL(A.NT_BBS_CONTENT, '') AS NT_BBS_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.NT_REG_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD'),'') AS NT_REG_DATE, A.NT_FILE_SEQ, NVL(A.NT_FILE_ORG_NAME, '') AS NT_FILE_ORG_NAME, NVL(A.NT_FILE_NAME, '') AS NT_FILE_NAME, NVL(A.NT_FILE_EXT, '') AS NT_FILE_EXT, NVL(A.NT_FILE_SIZE, 0) AS NT_FILE_SIZE FROM TBL_NT_BOARD A, TBL_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY A.NT_BBS_SEQ DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT NT_BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, NVL(NT_BBS_TITLE, '') AS NT_BBS_TITLE, NVL(NT_BBS_CONTENT, '') AS NT_BBS_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(NT_REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS NT_REG_DATE, NT_FILE_SEQ, NVL(NT_FILE_ORG_NAME, '') AS NT_FILE_ORG_NAME, NVL(NT_FILE_NAME, '') AS NT_FILE_NAME, NVL(NT_FILE_EXT, '') AS NT_FILE_EXT, NVL(NT_FILE_SIZE, 0) AS NT_FILE_SIZE FROM TBL_NT_BOARD WHERE NT_BBS_SEQ = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_NT_BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_NT_BOARD ( NT_BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, NT_BBS_TITLE, NT_BBS_CONTENT, NT_REG_DATE, NT_FILE_SEQ, NT_FILE_ORG_NAME, NT_FILE_NAME, NT_FILE_EXT, NT_FILE_SIZE ) VALUES ( #{ntBbsSeq}, #{userId}, #{ntBbsTitle}, #{ntBbsContent}, SYSDATE, (SELECT NVL(MAX(NT_BBS_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TBL_NT_BOARD), #{ntFileOrgName}, #{ntFileName}, #{ntFileExt}, #{ntFileSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_NT_BOARD SET NT_BBS_TITLE = #{ntBbsTitle}, NT_BBS_CONTENT = #{ntBbsContent}, NT_FILE_ORG_NAME = #{ntFileOrgName}, NT_FILE_NAME = #{ntFileName}, NT_FILE_EXT = #{ntFileExt}, NT_FILE_SIZE = #{ntFileSize} WHERE NT_BBS_SEQ = #{ntBbsSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT NT_BBS_SEQ, NT_FILE_SEQ, NVL(NT_FILE_ORG_NAME, '') AS NT_FILE_ORG_NAME, NVL(NT_FILE_NAME, '') AS NT_FILE_NAME, NVL(NT_FILE_EXT, '') AS NT_FILE_EXT, NVL(NT_FILE_SIZE, 0) AS NT_FILE_SIZE FROM TBL_NT_BOARD WHERE NT_BBS_SEQ = #{value}
